author: cbs8
title: Virtual Press Office Exhibitor Profiles: PhotoPlus Expo 2015
text:
Virtual Press Office
PhotoPlus Expo 2015 is in New York from October 21-24
NEW YORK , Oct. 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- The following event roundup from Virtual Press Office is a list of featured exhibitors for the PDN PhotoPlus International Conference + Expo 2015, the largest photography and imaging show in North America , which takes place from October 21-24 at the Jacob K. Javits Convention Center in New York City .
PhotoPlus Expo 2015 press kits, news releases and photos are available on the Official Online Press Office, managed by Virtual Press Office/PR Newswire: http://photoplus.vporoom.com/
PhotoPlus Expo 2015 press kits on Virtual Press Office
Leica Camera
Booths #136 and #137
For more information, visit leica-camera.com.
Think Tank Photo
Booth #1037 Think Tank Photo is a group of designers and professional photographers focused on studying how photographers work, and developing inventive new carrying solutions to meet their needs. By focusing on "speed" and "accessibility," we prepare photographers to Be Ready "Before The Moment," allowing them to document those historic moments that reflect their personal visions and artistic talents.
Wacom Technology
Booth #1229
For more information, visit wacom.com.
WhiteWall
Booth #140
WhiteWall is trusted as the photographer's complete, professional resource for turning digital images into stunning gallery-quality works of art. Offering a wide range of exceptional photo finishing services and extraordinary German craftsmanship on WhiteWall.com, the online photo lab will exhibit its complete line of unique substrates including HD Metal Prints, Photos under Acrylic and a variety of handcrafted frames – all available in custom sizes. WhiteWall prints are made-to-order, ready-to-hang, and ship worldwide in under two weeks.
At this year's PhotoPlus Expo, WhiteWall will introduce several new products including Real Photo Prints on Wood. For the rustic wood-mounted prints, customers can choose between a ¾-inch-thick natural plywood or anthracite-gray MDF backing and either a matte or glossy finish. The plywood look is perfect for landscape photography, while the dark MDF panel creates the impression of an understated frame, making it a fantastic accent for black-and-white photography.
The above press kits will continue to be updated throughout the show. Please check back during PhotoPlus Expo 2015 for the latest news.
Virtual Press Office ( http://www.vporoom.com/ ) is a PR Newswire company. Follow us on Twitter @VPOEventZone or subscribe to our RSS feed for more trade show news. If you have questions about Virtual Press Office services, or if you would like to offer feedback on this exhibitor profile roundup, please email sales@vpoinc.com .
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/virtual-press-office-exhibitor-profiles-photoplus-expo-2015-300162505.html
